mapper.select: SELECT SW_CD as a FROM COM_SW_TB
select SW_CD as swCode ,SW_NM as swName ,SW_WON as swWon ,SW_TERM as swTerm from COM_SW_TB

select SW_ORDER_CD as swOrderCode ,RECEIVE_USER_CD as receiveUserCode ,ORDER_USER_CD as orderUserCode ,SHOP_CD as shopCode ,SW_CD as swCode ,ORDER_DT as orderDate from COM_ORDER_TB where ORDER_USER_CD=#{userCode}

select PAYMENT_CD as paymentCode ,ORDER_CD as orderCode ,USER_CD as userCode ,SHOP_CD as shopCode ,SW_CD as swCode ,SW_WON as swWon ,SW_PAYMENT_OPTION_NM as swPaymentOptionName ,SW_PAYMENT_DT as swPaymentDate ,SW_STARTING_SERVICE_DT as swStartingServiceDate ,SW_ENDING_SERVICE_DT as swEndingServiceDate ,SW_SERVICE_ST swServiceStatus from COM_PAYMENT_TB where USER_CD=#{userCode}
